      • indexGetForSchema

        IndexDescriptor[] indexGetForSchema​(SchemaDescriptorSupplier index,
                                    PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Find the IndexRule that matches the given SchemaDescriptorSupplier.
        Parameters:
        index - the target IndexDescriptor
        Returns:
        an array of all the matching index rules. Empty array if none found.

      • indexGetForName

        IndexDescriptor indexGetForName​(String indexName,
                                PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Find the IndexRule that has the given user supplied name.
        Parameters:
        indexName - the user supplied index name to look for.
        Returns:
        the matching IndexRule, or null if no matching index rule was found.

      • constraintsGetSingle

        ConstraintDescriptor constraintsGetSingle​(ConstraintDescriptor descriptor,
                                          PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
                                   throws SchemaRuleNotFoundException,
                                          DuplicateSchemaRuleException
        Get the constraint rule that matches the given ConstraintDescriptor
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the ConstraintDescriptor to match
        Returns:
        the matching ConstraintDescriptor
        Throws:
        SchemaRuleNotFoundException - if no ConstraintDescriptor matches the given descriptor
        DuplicateSchemaRuleException - if two or more ConstraintDescriptors match the given descriptor

      • constraintsGetAllIgnoreMalformed

        Iterator<ConstraintDescriptor> constraintsGetAllIgnoreMalformed​(PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)

      • getSchemaRecordChangeTranslator

        SchemaRecordChangeTranslator getSchemaRecordChangeTranslator()

      • writeSchemaRule

        void writeSchemaRule​(SchemaRule rule,
                     PageCursorTracer cursorTracer,
                     MemoryTracker memoryTracker)
              throws KernelException
        Write the given schema rule at the location given by its persistent id, overwriting any data that might be at that location already. This is a non-transactional operation that is used during schema store migration.
        Throws:
        KernelException

      • deleteSchemaRule

        void deleteSchemaRule​(SchemaRule rule,
                      PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Deletes the schema rule at the location given by the persistent id of the schema rule given as an argument. This is a non-transactional operation that is primarily used for testing.
